This game is absolute trash. Do you want to have good, light-hearted fun with a few friends? Are you looking for the next COD or Halo to fill the void? Do you want to simply enjoy a game for what it is?

Well, then never play Counter-Strike: Global offensive.

This game f---king sucks. It snot fun. I have over 300 hours, and I am not even close to "good". I only play out of peer pressure. My personal hell is going to be me having to play this game forever, always stuck in Silver 4.
